title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4234.2 - Rain checks
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4234.2 - Rain checks

State Regulations

In the event of the cancellation of any program after the
completion of a numerical majority of the races to be scheduled to be run on
such program, no rain checks or other similar forms of deferred admissions
shall be issued on admittance, no rain checks will be validated. In the event
of a cancellation of any program before the completion of a numerical majority
of the races scheduled to run on such program, rain checks or other similar
forms of deferred free admission shall be issued but no rain check or other
form of deferred free admission shall be valid beyond the close of the meeting
at which it is issued. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4234.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
